mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` ( order_number, user_id, train_id, departure_station_id, arrival_station_id, departure_date, departure_time, arrival_time, seat_type, passenger_id_card, passenger_real_name, ticket_price, order_status, pay_status, pay_time, expire_time, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{orderNumber}, #{userId}, #{trainId}, #{departureStationId}, #{arrivalStationId}, #{departureDate}, #{departureTime}, #{arrivalTime}, #{seatType}, #{passengerIdCard}, #{passengerRealName}, #{ticketPrice}, #{orderStatus}, #{payStatus}, #{payTime}, #{expireTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `order` WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM `order` WHERE order_status = #{status} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM `order` WHERE order_status = 0 AND expire_time <= #{currentTime}
mapper.update: UPDATE `order` SET order_status = #{orderStatus}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE `order` SET pay_status = #{payStatus}, pay_time = CASE WHEN #{payStatus} = 1 THEN NOW() ELSE pay_time END, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE `order` SET order_status = 2, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND order_status = 0
